sentences.en: a blue movie
sentences.cn: 色情片

sentences.en: arrived out of the blue.
sentences.cn: 突然拜访

sentences.en: criticism that came out of the blue.
sentences.cn: 突如其来的批评

sentences.en: He felt strangely exhilarated by the brisk, blue morning.
sentences.cn: 那个凉爽而晴朗的早晨让他异常兴奋。

sentences.en: He had clear blue eyes and a jutting chin.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和凸出的下巴。

sentences.en: He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

sentences.en: He put the flowers in a wide-mouthed blue vase.
sentences.cn: 他把花放进蓝色阔口花瓶里。

sentences.en: He stared at me out of those washed-out blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用暗淡无神的蓝眼睛盯着我看。

sentences.en: He was wearing a stripy shirt and baggy blue trousers.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件条纹衬衫和一条宽松的蓝裤子。

sentences.en: He wore a plain blue shirt, open at the collar.
sentences.cn: 他穿一件素净的蓝色衬衫，领口敞着。

sentences.en: Her silk dress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的丝绸连衣裙是天蓝色的，和她眼睛的颜色一样。

sentences.en: Her silk shirtdress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她一袭天蓝色的真丝衬衫式连身裙，和她的双眸颜色一样。

sentences.en: I argued with them until I was blue in the face.
sentences.cn: 和他们争论到我脸色发青

sentences.en: I’ve been feeling kind of blue.
sentences.cn: 我心情不大好。

sentences.en: Liz picked up the blue envelope and turned it over curiously.
sentences.cn: 莉兹拿起蓝色信封，好奇地翻过来看。

sentences.en: Red, white and blue bunting hung in the city's renovated train station.
sentences.cn: 红、白、蓝彩旗装点着该市修复一新的火车站。

sentences.en: she could talk to him until she was blue in the face, but he was just not hearing.
sentences.cn: 她可以和他谈到累死，可他只当没听见。

sentences.en: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.cn: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

sentences.en: She stared dreamily out of the small window at the blue horizon.
sentences.cn: 她出神地看着小窗子外面的蓝色地平线。

sentences.en: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.cn: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.en: The blue whale is the largest living thing on the planet.
sentences.cn: 蓝鲸是地球上体型最大的生物。

sentences.en: the rich greens and blues of the tapestry
sentences.cn: 挂毯上浓艳的绿色和蓝色

sentences.en: Whenever she refused, he'd beat her black and blue.
sentences.cn: 只要她拒绝他，他就会把她打得青一块紫一块。

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 遍体鳞伤的；青一块紫一块
脸色发青：至于或处于极度愤怒的状态
牛仔裤；蓝色斜纹布裤子
不可能或稀有的时期或事情

phrases.phrase: do something until (或 till) one is blue in the fac
phrases.tran_cn: 累死累活白干一场，忙得脸色发紫
(非正式)难得有一次，极为罕见
突然的，始料不及的：在意料不到的时间里
(北美，非正式)喋喋不休，没完没了地说，说个不停
不褪色的蓝色；忠实的保守派人士

trans.tran_cn: （天）蓝色的，发青的，忧郁的，色情的
trans.tran_en: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

trans.tran_cn: 把…染成蓝色；使成蓝色；给…用上蓝剂；用上蓝剂于
